website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba Encore 8 offers a lot for its price, but the more appealing Dell Venue 8 Pro is a cheaper and sleeker alternative.
pros: The Toshiba Encore 8 runs Windows 8.1, boasts zippy performance, and has a microSD storage expansion slot
cons: The design is bulkier and heavier than most other small tablets
With no keyboard accessory, desktop mode is a headache to navigate

customer_reviews.title: They would have been perfect if it wasn't for these two flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids. They would have been perfect if it wasn't for these two flaws: 1. You can't use any usb cable to charge the device. Don't know what's so special about it. You have to use Toshiba's USB cable or a USB that says its compatible with the Encore WT8. 2. Don't let the battery die. Charging is ridiculous. It takes 3 to 4 days to get back up to 100%. Don't plan on buying another Toshiba tablet again. Had no such issues with my Asus tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Stands out of the crowd with HDMI!
customer_reviews.text: one of the only tablets with an HDMI port which is 100% necessary if you want to use this as a laptop/desktop replacement. the unit is sturdy, looks nice, has great resolution and good brightness. battery life seems great so far and the fact that it comes with OFFICE 2013 and not 365 makes it worth the money alone. i read and experienced the screen off issue but once i updated the bios and all other updates it has been perfect. the new version of this the encore 2 lacks an hdmi port, has half the ram, is packaged with OFFICE 365 and costs more money > don't have to be a computer nerd to pick the better value.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Overheats
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable to hold in you hand when it's so hot. Also the fact that the usb port needs to be used as charger port its a minus as well since then you can't use peripherals. I found that the Acer Iconia w3 had a separate port for charging and I am truly surprised of how great it works. only setback the heaviest tablet in the win8 market. if you need it for ppoints presentation get and will use it with a keyboard get the Acer.
customer_reviews.author: Daldo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent windows tablet with GPS
customer_reviews.text: Needed a Windows tablet that had an in built GPS and did not depend on a Data SIM or Wifi. This one did the job beautifully. We used 15 in all for a project. Note that the newer model does not have the GPS capability so the model number is very important in ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Baldeosingh

customer_reviews.title: awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tablet and despite the negative reviews and problems listed I have none of the issues save for camera glitch which has happened a few times. we are rally enjoying this tablet, I use it all day everyday... reccomended
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awsome device, can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba is not the first brand you think of when you think of a tablet or laptop. Turns out that they don't have to hide from the competition. I was amazed by the features and performance of this tablet, especially for this price. In the meanwhile I a had a chance to get my hands on an Encore II, which is faster, lighter and cheaper. Wow again. Next time I will look at Toshiba's stuff first before looking at any of the competitor's devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tep

customer_reviews.title: Damn thing locked up all the time. The screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Damn thing locked up all the time. The screen did not respond to touch commands and one had to let the battery rundown in order to reset the device. Once it was reset, it would respond appropriately until it locked up again for no apparent reason. We read the user's manual and tried to reset the device but had little success. We returned the device.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Slow but OK for some things
customer_reviews.text: In my case I was unlucky to have disk/emmc failures. One big hole with most of these tablets is they cannot run Acronis for backup. And, these are quite slow because they are emmc drives with a very slow interface. The benchmark may be only something like 1/5 that of an Asus with a real controller and a real solid state drive.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardware, but some bugs still persist
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet to use as a small laptop, but Windows 8.1 is still a struggle. Complete lack of support from Toshiba is annoying. Unit occasionally refuses to turn the screen back on when in power conservation mode. Pushing the button causes a vibration feedback, but a hard reset is needed to get the display back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pick This Win8 Tablet Over Any Other 8"
customer_reviews.text: My first Windows tablet. I picked this over other Win8 tablets because of the reviews and have not been disappointed. It has a solid build, the hardware works the way it should, and it's reasonably fast. It even can run a database server in the background to be a complete stand-alone solution for coding projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Very, VERY disappointed in this tablet. I have had it 6 months and am about to send it back in on warranty issues for the second time. I bought it to use while travelling, and so far the most travel it has seen is back and forth for warranty work. I have been a long time fan of Toshiba, but this has shaken my faith.
customer_reviews.author: R. Priesing

customer_reviews.title: The touch screen is sometimes unresponsive and the computer freezes pretty easily. I am disappointed with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had gotten a google nexus. This tablet has "meh" apps from microsoft. I can not get "Words with Friends", and miss playing Scrabble with my friends. The writing is too small and when I enlarge, the writing does not fit the screen correctly. The touch screen is sometimes unresponsive and the computer freezes pretty easily. I am disappointed with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: kater

customer_reviews.title: No Replacement Parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet about one year ago and enjoyed the tablet until I dropped it and broke the screen. The tablet still works perfectly but it is virtually impossible to purchase a replacement screen. The cost to send the tablet to Toshiba for repair exceeds the cost of the tablet new. I have a difficult time grasping the concept of not having replacement parts for something that is such a integral component.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Craig

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned as it was freezing, unfare from seller to penalize an unsatisfied customer in loosing money on an item who does not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fils-Aime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet with Windows to work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tablet with Windows is quickly and you can work with Excel, Word, Project, Ram Advance, or any other software as a pc. I installed Ram Advance and engineering tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonny Chambilla

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dead after 4 months. During those 4 months it froze numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Shahab Sia

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice tablet. Can't see any problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tablet. Can't see any problems. It has worked great. Take your time getting it set up correctly, and you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet. Nice speed. Nice battery life. Good performance. My only complaint is disk space. I had to add an SD card for additional space. Excellent hardware quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I suspect that toshiba encore generally is a good
customer_reviews.text: product was defective upon arrival. seller offered full refund. I suspect that toshiba encore generally is a good tablet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent, it is not the best
customer_reviews.text: excellent , it is not the best, but the best value for money
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tablet I got mine used which I never do so I was scared but when o had recived it it was in amazing condition although storage is very small I would recommend a hard drive or a USB stick for more storage
customer_reviews.author: Hayden A.

customer_reviews.title: It has issues with the updates. It won't let ...
customer_reviews.text: It has issues with the updates. It won't let you use the camera unless you update it manually. sometimes it does not turn on for days.
customer_reviews.author: Raul S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing convenience, but do not lose the OEM charger
customer_reviews.text: Using it now! Amazing convenience, but do not lose the OEM charger. Hard to replace correctly.
customer_reviews.author: BruceTman

customer_reviews.title: Took it on a recent trip to Europe it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a recent trip to Europe it was just what I wanted to stay in touch with a not to big not to small tablet. Fast as a rocket and Windows 8.1 works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: calicorock

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet. HDMI out works well, especially on screens that are not super big or a really high resolution. I recommend updating all drivers via Windows update and Toshiba service station. I also recommend moving the recovery partition to a USB stick to free up storage space (again Toshiba provides an application to do this. Finally, you'll need a micro USB to USB adapter to really use Office (keyboard/mouse) and move that recovery partition. Yes you'll need to invest some time up front doing updates but it will be worth it. Great buy at ~$190 and I feel the specs are better than the Encore 2.
customer_reviews.author: B. Knarr

customer_reviews.title: The tablet have the worst usb connection with the tablet
customer_reviews.text: The tablet have the worst usb connection with the tablet ,and froze up on standby the battery life is weaker than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: sleepyotaku

customer_reviews.title: w8 device
customer_reviews.text: 32gb, 20 isn't being used up. sdcard slot of 64gb alotted. 1tb harddrive will work. battery life is 7-10 hours. screen is 1280-800(slightly above 720p) headphone jack built in. built in speakers. Can use windows, linux or mac on the thing if you know what you're doing. Can use, well actually yes it does android/ios apps too because it's essentially the system everything's made on basically. I'll try to keep these reviews as clear and short as possible to avoid confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Ozagas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speed and batttery
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Amazing speed, 32GB SD card to play mi Oblivion, SimCity and Civ games and also launches Office 2013 as in a laptop. I have no complains with 2 months of use. Also I watched 2 hours of Netflix and just took 10% of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Reliable but unrefined
customer_reviews.text: Been a daily user of the Encore for 8 months now and happy to say it works well. I have fewer complaints about this tablet than I do about previous Android and iPad tablets which are now performing some menial task like playing music or facebook. Having the power of Windows in a tablet is a great combo for me. Will be sticking with Windows tablets and upgrading to something a bit more refined in the future. For now the Encore does the trick, and rather well for the money. Biggest complaint is the wifi range is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for over a year, and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year, and have had nothing but problems with it. The screen flickers unless the brightness is on the lowest setting. I have consistent problems with charging it.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Klevgard

customer_reviews.title: I had bought it in june 8 but the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought it in june 8 but the camera just worked for some days after I bought. Until now no is working
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: i love it so far its been working good i love ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it so far its been working good i love toshiba products
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Camera problem
customer_reviews.text: Have a Camera problem, the software doesn't detect it despite i already did a full web upgrade! Please send me the solution
customer_reviews.author: Jacobo Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: this is the best laptop/netbook you can buy
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is the best laptop/netbook you can buy. I say that because this runs full Windows 8, and it runs it on specs that blow away the cheapest laptops (and those are more expensive than this). You need a USB dock and a microusb to USB adapter, but even after purchasing those and the relevant peripherals, you are saving money and getting decent performance. In a market that wants to constantly combine tablets and laptops - this does it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Scampoli

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, good price, works super fast, and it has windows so is a completely functional tablet, great for business and school. The only bad thing is that's is has some delays at some times or just don't answer so I just turn the screen off, (not the tablet) and its back. But I recommend this as a functional tablet, you can use everything on it, its fast enough
customer_reviews.author: Cec

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life, useless as a tablet
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last at all. Fully charged in the morning, didn't use it at all until about 8 hours later and it's already dead. This happened multiple times and only had the tablet for a couple of months. Total waste of money. It is now in the trash. Spent more time updating windows than using the tablet. Almost each time I want to use it I had to wait (or already dead and needs a charge). User experience = lots of swear words
customer_reviews.author: 火龍

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not have it 30 days and it stopped working I could not turn it on
customer_reviews.author: hillary sears

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use for college. It's small enough to fit in a purse. It synched with my computer so I basically have everything on the go. It also comes with Microsoft office. The battery power lasts for a long time and does not take a long time to charge. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is totally awesome! The image is crystal clear and just the right size! I have a nokia lumia 925 and a toshiba taptop. This handy device bridges the gap between the smaller screen size of my smartphone and the bigger screen of my laptop. I have all three devices synced together through windows 8.1 and share files through the cloud. It totally rocks! I watch netflicks with it and also write music with it. Check this app out if you are interested!
customer_reviews.author: David Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Cannot turned-on after 20 days
customer_reviews.text: The phone went down few days ago, not more than 20 days after I used it. The battery seems to be the problem. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vincentius Simeon Weo Budhyanto

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool tablet. for the cost you get a full Win8.1 PC in a SUPER small form factor. Running windows, so there is no learning curve. You may have problems with screen resolution, but all in all pretty neat and nice size. Not perfect and not for everyone, Does work with usb OTG cables. Needed to create backup/ recovery of system.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the tablet but, the memory is so low that a pop up gets on every time saying you don't have enough memory. I bought a usb with a memory chip to help with my storage and, that didn't stop the low memory warning.
customer_reviews.author: jimemc

customer_reviews.title: First Win8 tablet
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered earlier than expected. I love the packaging since it comes with a bundle of other items. This is my first windows 8 tablet and so far I am enjoying it. I however, one complain about this.. every time it comes from sleep my Wi-Fi goes limited connection, it doesn't connect automatically. So I have to disconnect and reconnect to my Wi-Fi to gain internet access. I have updated to the latest driver updates but still the same problem. Other than that this tablet could have been perfect and could have given a 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: leunamme

customer_reviews.title: Intel powered tablet, a decent compromise with support for legacy PC software
customer_reviews.text: Would like it more if it were equipped with a full size usb port and discrete charging port. The battery life, even after applying all of the updates leaves much to be desired, but I really like the fact that it is a very portable intel powered pc with a 4 core atom processor
customer_reviews.author: jsanti1984

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Used
customer_reviews.text: I received this item 4 days after the anticipated delivery date. When I got it, the Web camera was inoperational and under the screen protective sheet were fingerprints. I also noticed that the box in which it came, had one side where the tape was cut. The item was obviously used prior to me recieving it. Sorry, I paid full price for a used tablet? The item isn't listed as refurbished either. The box in which the tablet arrived was not tampered with; therefore it was a problem with the distributer not delivery (although it did take 4 days longer than anticipated; order May 23, didn't get it until June 2.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyHittman

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Overheating. Always shutting down and freezing. Burnt plastic smell when using
customer_reviews.author: Timbone

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine piece. Install the tablet version of Windows 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece. Install the tablet version of Windows 8 and free up a lot of space. Copy your backup to a USB drive first.
customer_reviews.author: ckp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to learn Windows 8 without buying a new PC. Still getting use to it but enjoying how it works. Nice to not sit at a PC for a change. This is the WORST PC I've ever owned. It's only 13 1/2 months since I have it and it doesn't work at all. Had trouble charging it (wouldn't take) Now It DOESN"T WORK AT ALL!! Can't return because the warranty just expired. So I am out $200.00. I always swore by Toshiba but now I have second thoughts. DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET and WASTE YOUR MONEY. READ & WATCH YOU TUBE VIDEOS FIRST! Sorry Toshiba I am very disappointed in your product as others.
customer_reviews.author: gramy

customer_reviews.title: very bad
customer_reviews.text: very bad stays stuck is slow at times is blocked and not awake updates damage system operating screen go completely crazy and sometimes does not shut down should be restoring a each time the office takes too long to open the screen is too small unreadable text at high resolutions. camera not open storage is just fast build quality is bad the only thing that can be noted of this tablet is that it is very cheap. I had high expectations to toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXIS G.

customer_reviews.title: so good
customer_reviews.text: it's good to use. easy to carry. better than iPad . i like it very much. i will recommend to my friend
customer_reviews.author: vicko

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has met all my needs. I have an engineering software loaded onto this and No lag. Wanted a 64 GB but this one has worked just fine. Veeery happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product...
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed for purchasing this product. The battery does not charge. totally dead.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got Windows 8.1 and Office for $249.99 can't complain about that! Not Bad for being on a low budget! Wish I had the budget for a bigger tablet, but hey what can you do.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Learning Windows 8.1 when you have no prior experience is a pain but the tablet works like a champ. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P. Goersch

customer_reviews.title: TOSHBIA HAS A BAD WARRENTY POLICY
customer_reviews.text: DOES NoT WORK . TOSHIBA says the seller is not a LEGAL TOSHBIA dealer and wont cover it under warrenty
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of hardware,sound could be better but this tablet is fast,responsive and useful for doing things far beyond than just playing and surfing on internet apps.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Patricia Medina Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I really like the battery power on these.
customer_reviews.author: ral68

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son's Toshiba Encore arrived in a timely manner, considering that we live on a military base in Asia. We were initially pleased since my 12 year old saved his allowance to buy his first tablet. The last two days, the tablet has not been functioning correctly. First, the tablet would not turn on. The next day, the tablet did turn on, but all functions have frozen! The tablet now makes a buzzing noise and is unusable! So incrediably disappointed in the product!
customer_reviews.author: TonjaLP

customer_reviews.title: Problem with switch on the tablet
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Design and features are good. Cons: After charging the battery it is very difficult to switch on the tablet and there is no reset button to fixed the problem and also the sound quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Sandip Khan

customer_reviews.title: Better than any android tablet
customer_reviews.text: Better than any android tablet. This is a tablet with a real operating system that you can do anything with it. The design feels good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Super Assistance
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tablet! Appreciate all the help with shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus F. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. It works nice. You can do a lot with it. It is just like having a computer just smaller. You can print and scan. You have a desktop like with a computer. Windows 8.1 works great. Windows 8.1 and the tablet itself has been works smoothly. If a problem does arise and it freezes it will shut off on its own and restart with the problem fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Snoweagle

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks would like this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast processing and easy to use windows 8.1 which I already have on my Toshiba laptop. 8 inch screen is a good size not too big and not too small....like Goldilocks said " just right"
customer_reviews.author: RANDAL JONES

customer_reviews.title: Overall great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: My choice was between the iPad Mini, the Google Nexus 7, and the Dell Venue Pro 8. The Toshiba tablet was the only one with HDMI out and a good design. Software somewhat buggy. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: everythings_bigerinTexas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: the best thing about it is the Windows Full experience! as if you were working on your own laptop .. I recommend it, but recommend the 64GB edition
customer_reviews.author: M.Wadah J.

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: i liked it but it stopped working after 3 days amazon is doing an amazing job with their customer service and giving me an exchange in 1 day so i will do a more in depth review when i get my new one.
customer_reviews.author: scigod

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tablet with many features. I especially like the windows 8.1 capability. An instruction booklet would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ute M. Kent

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work. I sent it back for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. I sent it back for a refund. I bought another brand locally.
customer_reviews.author: jack mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Not that I hated it. When I went to try the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Not that I hated it. When I went to try the camera out it blacked out - got very very hot - then died as there was nothing. NOTHING!! Returned for a refund. Do not want another Encore!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadine Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Had to give it to my son because of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to give it to my son because of my eye's and the 8 in tablet words and apps are just to small on the areas that can't be enlarged. My son really likes it. Windows should allow you to enlarge the apps and start and manual pages for us old folk. Every page should enlarge.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Treffic little machine and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Toshibas Encore WT8-A32 8" 32 GB Tablet is a great little computer with the Windows 8.1 OS and is compatible with my other computers when making up documents, as you can save them to the cloud and then retrieve them on another computer. Very easy to use and I like it a lot better than the Androids. For me it is also fast enough for games and other apps that are compatible with Windows 8.1. It is a great little system and I carry it with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Mattice

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Encore
customer_reviews.text: How exciting to own a tablet. Now, no more popping up from the den to desktop to check on something on the Internet. Only drawback is keyboard covers up some input lines, but that is remedied by purchasing a bluetooth keyboard or using smaller onscreen keyboard app.
customer_reviews.author: K. FRYE

customer_reviews.title: man i sent this thing back
customer_reviews.text: i could not get into this device at all....i promptly wrapped it up and sent it back..it is way too difficult to use......got a refund promptly..Amazon rocks..
customer_reviews.author: jimmy three

customer_reviews.title: ENCORE TOSHIBA 8.1
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Tablet, after installation of Windows 8 memory ???????. Have issues everytime I attempt to log into the apps you have to put in too much info, but still nice tablet, will update as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Hapsmom

customer_reviews.title: good device
customer_reviews.text: Very nice windows tablet. I have now been using it for 2 weeks and it works great. I have been using an ipad for the last 2.5 years. I like the ios system but for my work purposes this windows tablet provides me with more options in terms of printing, file transfers, and connections to external displays. This tablet is fast and responsive. You get a lot of value for you money compared to an ipad product. The only draw back is it the lack of apps available for windows products. I would give it 5 stars if the app selection were better. I guess that will come with time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. Charged it overnight and it would not power up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dunn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: After a full month, my mind is still blown by how amazing this product is. Thank you so very much.
customer_reviews.author: Steven T. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Windows tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compliment to my PC and both work on windows 8.1. Got tired of android tablet, wanted to match system of my PC.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: product unfunctionaly and incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars, I receive a tablet Toshiba encore 2 8.1 with windows 8, the information says 1.83 procesator an 32 GB hard drive, I receive the box says that, but the fisic tablet when check it, this it's say 1.33 and 24 GB. This is frauds I the seller say I have to return and the refound is less 15 or 25%and I have to pay 212$ for aall, total lost and I have many trouble with the front camera trouble touch and is turn block screen, please toshiba - descount y aend you back all item but i need new equipment I used for work!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Morataya

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Have had it almost a month. Good size, good power, and good storage. I used it daily until it got knocked off my night stand and the screen shattered. I guess I will be able to review how easy/hard it is to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Baublitz

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value for a tablet. Performs extremely well. I bought the Encore for my daughter and I have to request that she gives it a time out.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen weak
customer_reviews.text: It 's OK, had problems with touch recognition. I have calloused fingers that don't conduct well. This unit could use a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Hardworkinman

customer_reviews.title: Worst Tab I have ever seen and used
customer_reviews.text: Worst Tab I have ever seen and used...shutting down for no reason, Battery is discharging even after shutdown. I wonder why Toshiba has introduced such a incomplete product. I am so fed up of it and gave up. I have decided not to buy W8 Tab anymore. Changed my mind to buy Ipad air. Enough is enough...I would not recommend this piece of ....to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Durai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Its size makes it a product usable travel His battery life long It has a GPS Excellent touch screen responds It's a bit thick
customer_reviews.author: AVI F.

customer_reviews.title: I like it! but...low disk space!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet! It is very fast and fluid, only bad thing is that you have low disk space, 10GB free for user, spite of having 32GB, 20GB aprox. for windows and the software. But I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Patino

customer_reviews.title: Pors&Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: GPS, Micro HDMI port, Long battery life, Price(Around $210 for new one) Cons: No enough Accessories(i.e.No dedicated keyboard or docking system, expansive cover case)
customer_reviews.author: Seunghyun Kang

customer_reviews.title: wondeful tablet

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Tablet was like a new, everything including office activation key was in place. Tablet has a good for its price screen and just incredible performance in games.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I received within a few days. Worked okay for 20 days then would not turn back on. May have been a dud.

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease that this tablet synced with all the rest of my equipment. The storage capacity is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: rikkerada

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with the unit. For the price you can't beat it. Though if you need pro features spend the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ciccarone

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, but does not switch on.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as promised, box & item looks very smart, however will not switch on, contacted Toshiba, after 2 goes & 45 mins later decided it was a hardware problem & that I should return. OK these things happen, went to the amazon site went through the process of trying to return it & the adaptor I had bought with it, got to the stage of putting the details in & continuing, to get a message the quantities needed to be entered, the quantities of the items were included in the description, so went round the circle several time, ???? unable to email amazon, or chat to them. Several hours wasted, one very annoyed customer
customer_reviews.author: ALISTAIR GREATHEAD

customer_reviews.title: Price and HDMI are good!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing price! If you need to connect HDMI monitor or TV, you must choice it.
